================================== Ai Message ==================================
Name: inspection - site_area_router: 

Invoking the site area agent for below main activity:

<activity_id#PD_001> ###  Check the management of the PDs reported to ensure they have been resolved/closed in an acceptable time frame.

================================== Ai Message ==================================
Name: inspection - planner_agent:

Generating sub-activities for: <activity_id#PD_001> 

Below are the generated sub-activities:
• What are the specific PDs reported?
• What is the acceptable time frame for resolving/closing these PDs?
• Check if the time taken to resolve/close each PD is within the acceptable time range.

================================== Ai Message ==================================
Name: inspection - critique_agent:

Invoking critique agent for validating sub-activities 
LLM Feedback on sub-activities: 
Do we need to work on feedback-> Yes,
What is the feedback-> The sub-questions are generally relevant but need to be more specific and logically sequenced. The first sub-question should specify the type of PDs (Protocol Deviations) being reported. The second sub-question should clarify the source of the acceptable time frame (e.g., regulatory guidelines, internal SOPs). The third sub-question should be more actionable by specifying how to check the time taken (e.g., by reviewing logs or records). Additionally, the sequence should ensure that the identification of PDs comes first, followed by the determination of acceptable time frames, and finally the comparison of actual resolution times against these time frames.

================================== Ai Message ==================================
Name: inspection - feedback_agent node:

Working on feedback
Updated sub-activities:
1. Identify the types of Protocol Deviations being reported.
2. Determine the source of the acceptable time frame for resolving/closing Protocol Deviations (e.g., regulatory guidelines, internal Standard Operating Procedures).
3. Review logs or records to compare the actual resolution times of Protocol Deviations against the acceptable time frames.

================================== Ai Message ==================================

What is the feedback-> NA
